commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Links
commands.subtitle: Anybox
commands.description: Search for links and optionally collections in Anybox.

preferences.name: api_key
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: API key for search links in Anybox. You can find it in Anybox › Preferences › General.
preferences.placeholder: Enter API Key from Anybox › Preferences › General

preferences.name: searchCollections
preferences.label: Show Collections in Search Result
preferences.description: Enable to also search collections and limit search scope to one specific collection.

preferences.name: searchLinkDescriptions
preferences.label: Search Link Descriptions
preferences.description: Also search link descriptions when searching for links.

preferences.name: usePinyin
preferences.label: Search by Pinyin
preferences.description: Enable to also search link title by pinyin. Keep it disabled if you don’t know what it is.

commands.name: saveCurrentTab
commands.title: Save Current Tab
commands.subtitle: Anybox
commands.description: Save URL of current tab to Anybox.

commands.name: saveCurrentTabWithCollections
commands.title: Save Current Tab With Collections
commands.subtitle: Anybox
commands.description: Save URL of current tab to Anybox with optional collections.

commands.name: pasteWithCollections
commands.title: Save Clipboard With Collections
commands.subtitle: Anybox
commands.description: Save clipboard to Anybox with optional collections.

commands.name: saveNote
commands.title: Save Note
commands.subtitle: Anybox
commands.description: Save note to Anybox with optional collections.

preferences.name: autoFill
preferences.label: Auto Fill with Clipboard Text
preferences.description: If Checked, the note field will be filled with clipboard text.

commands.name: openAnydock
commands.title: Open All in Anydock Profile
commands.subtitle: Anybox
commands.description: Open all items in specific Anydock profile.

commands.name: showList
commands.title: Show List
commands.subtitle: Anybox
commands.description: Open Anybox’s main window and show list.
